plot: It is low season and Sandra travels to the coastal village where she used to spend summer vacations when she was a child. She looks for a room for next summer. In her search, past and present step in, so does Toño.
title: Entretiempo
plot_es: It is low season and Sandra travels to the coastal village where she used to spend summer vacations when she was a child. She looks for a room for next summer. In her search, past and present step in, so does Toño.
plot_en: It is low season and Sandra travels to the coastal village where she used to spend summer vacations when she was a child. She looks for a room for next summer. In her search, past and present step in, so does Toño.
